website_summaries.verdict: Lawn sprinkler with a substantial spray for older kids who feel they've outgrown neon and inflatables.
pros: Its 18 brass jets can shoot up to 66 feet
Easy to direct the spray where you want it to go
More substantial construction, so it stays in place
cons: Oscillating gears stop working relatively quickly on some sprinklers

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, sturdy metal frame; works well so far. Cautiously optimistic. However, the part of oscillating sprinklers that almost always fails first is the gearbox inside, not the frames. Have had "heavy-duty" sprinklers before whose gearing did not hold up. Will modify review from "4" to "5" if gearing holds up more than one season; I have a whole collection of defunct oscillating sprinklers that did not make it even one season and never two.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Mountain Farm

customer_reviews.title: Must be cheap gears
customer_reviews.text: This expensive sprinkler seemed like a good buy originally but after 8 weeks it quit oscillating. NOTE: I contacted the manufacturer and they immediately sent me a new gearbox with instructions on replacement. It would appear that I'm not the first one to have this happen. But I have to give them credit for handling this swiftly.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 Years But Then Major Problem
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these because they, at first, appeared to be very well made and worked flawlessly. However after almost 2.5 years BOTH of these had the same problem: they would get stuck in one position and would not oscillate. This happened on the return oscillation and must be a design problem where something is wearing/sticking. Unfortunately I could not take these apart. Obviously this is a very major problem for an oscillating sprinkler. At this price I would expect better quality. I gave an extra star because I got almost 3 years use but I really was leaning to a one star rating!
customer_reviews.author: John Felegi, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Picture is incorrect - the hose connection is PLASTIC, not metal!
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box, and here it is. Metal casing and jets but the connection - the most important part and one I shopped everywhere for before deciding on these - is NOT METAL, as is shown in the photo. Is is plastic, like all the other cheap ones. Very disappointed - I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: BerlinBlue

customer_reviews.title: Only worked short time
customer_reviews.text: Received this sprinkler mid- May. It seemed to work well at first, but then wouldn't adjust for full range and shortly after that kept getting stuck in one spot. We have tried for a couple months to work with it, but ended up buying a cheaper model that works great. In all fairness, my sister has one just like this that works fine for her. I'm mostly disappointed that we bought this more expensive sprinkler because we had heard they were a great product.
customer_reviews.author: barbra l camper

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This works fine at first but be prepared to throw it in the trash when it stops oscillating. For the cost, this should last for many years. I contacted the company and they told me I didn't have the oscillating bar aligned. Well, they are wrong, it is aligned just as they suggested and the oscillation still quits. If you really want one of these, search your neighbors trash because there will be one in it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Stopped oscillating
customer_reviews.text: This sprinkler arrived in excellent condition; however, it immediately operated sporadically (stopped and started oscillating). After about two hours of use it no longer oscillates. I hate dealing with shipping and customer service centers so I will eat this mistake.
customer_reviews.author: EBeth

customer_reviews.title: An awesome sprinkler!
customer_reviews.text: Although you might balk at the price, this sprinkler is designed very well. It is solid, so it doesn't slide around like cheap Chinese made sprinklers, plus I expect that it will last longer than the one-two seasons you might get out of a cheaper one. (American made!) The really cool feature is how you can adjust the range of coverage. This gives you the ability to adjust the depth of coverage incrementally with the adjustment levers...a great idea and works really well. This eliminates the need to try to do this by constantly fiddling with the water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: It works.  It keeps working.
customer_reviews.text: Needed reliable watering after overseeding lawn. Dramm sprinkler does the job with no fuss or attention required. No problems so far. Coverage is easy to adjust without an instruction manual. Metal base has the weight to stay in place. All metal except for user- replaceable plastic geared oscillating mechanism. Dramm has excellent reputation for sending no-cost replacement if it fails. Have not tested this personally because operation during the first season has been trouble-free.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Tech

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these sprinklers
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made and easy to use. We have two of them and would highly recommend them. They cover well with good water pressure (which is not always the case where we live) and are very gentle on the grass. A very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Catman

customer_reviews.title: Dramm fan, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I have everything Dramm, but this one didn’t do it for me. For the price I would have expected to have the ability to adjust the width of the spray; you cannot. And it really moves back and forth too quickly. Another brand that I was replacing after years of use had a much slower movement allowing greater watering as it worked. It is well made, but how it works could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage, Quality issue
customer_reviews.text: The range of coverage is great and the ability to control the water pressure from the sprinkler itself is a great convenient feature. You no longer have to go back and forth between the sprinkler and the water spigot. You can adjust the pressure and thereby the coverage from the sprinkler itself. The design was very sturdy and the metal design is great but I couldn't give it 5 stars because when I received it, it was already cracked. I had to replace it but the function is great!
customer_reviews.author: veritech_13Top Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: We use a sprinkler in the back and front of our house. This will be the third in a year for the back. Our first sprinkler was garbage, both broke after a season despite being put away. I accidentally stepped on the second and snapped an important plastic part. Sprinkler # 2 had no real instruction on it, so I decided to shop for something better. I've found it, it sends studier, has a better spray and clearer controls. I'm hoping this one lasts a few seasons.
customer_reviews.author: MET

customer_reviews.title: Returned it....
customer_reviews.text: The threading was so shallow that I could not screw my hose in far enough. The result was that it would leak badly or it would pop off all together. Every time I tried to move it while running or even one not running, the holes would pop off. For such an expensive basic sprinkler you would expect that it would work. I did however like the choice of colors, and I thought it shot far enough and the water pressure was good.
customer_reviews.author: KateS

customer_reviews.title: I believe in buying as good a tool as you can afford
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far so I maybe premature giving it a 5 star but the solid construction just knocks me out. I have replaced and replaced cheap sprinklers. I believe in buying as good a tool as you can afford. Though this heavy weight is a little expensive, I would have saved money over the years had I bought one of these first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water Focus
customer_reviews.text: It works like a sprinkler is expected to work. It’s well made and mostly made out of metal as opposed to plastic. It also has the ability to set it so that the water only goes as high and as low as you desire. This way, the water focuses on the areas you want and isn’t wasted by spraying where you don’t want or need it to go.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating and useless.
customer_reviews.text: I have four others of this exact product line that I bought from a local store and everyone of them work perfectly. This one, however, goes One Direction and will not come back. If you jiggle it a bit then it will go the other direction by then go back and stick there AGAIN!!!! Frustrating and useless.
customer_reviews.author: pennyc

customer_reviews.title: Solid unit
customer_reviews.text: Seems solid, though it leaks like a sieve where the line bar connects. Can't seem to tighten it enough and don't want to break it. Solid metal, makes a nice pattern and I have some hope this one will last a bit. The last unit I bought was plastic and it snapped in about a week, this one seems much stronger; other than the leaking, it works well and I have high hopes for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Isbell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful exterior with same cheap mechanism
customer_reviews.text: We barely had this thing for five weeks and the oscillator stopped functioning. In that time we probably used it 20 times. The problem with this and all other oscillating sprinklers is that they use the same cheap plastic internal gearing that wears out very rapidly. This one wore outparticularly fast.
customer_reviews.author: Julie J

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my garden to supplement rain while the plants became established, therefore I've only been using it a couple of months but thus far it's doing great. It's coverage in all directions is great and the method for adjusting the pattern is very nice as it's far less frustrating then the dial style adjusters. It appears to be very well made and I like that the design doesn't allow the far end of the sprinkler bar to move around or dislodge as cheaper sprinklers tend to do. The only question is will it last? Are the internals as beefy as the outside? Only time and use will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Hillbillydream

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Don't  waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 1 month. Set everything just as the directions indicated and it still stopped rotating the way it was set. The most expensive sprinkler we ever bought and it was the worse thing ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: The sprinkler worked beautifully for ten minutes. Then it got stuck spraying water to the left. I "jiggled it," and it worked for another 5 minutes. Further jiggling only makes it do one rotation. I contacted the manufacturer by email and they were extremely quick in getting back to me, but they recommended returning it to Amazon. I will try another brand; however, it seems that there's a 10-15% chance that all these more expensive "premium" metal oscillating sprinklers get stuck like this from all the reviews I read. I have no doubt one can be excellent, but this one was definitely a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie B

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 3 of 4 months, then quit oscillating.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for first three or four months. Then it quit going back and forth and just puts water in one place. I bought this because it was American made, I think, and was reputed to be the best. I don't think six months of operational life is best, especially at the price.Quite disappointed. I admit that I have not contacted the company for help. I'll try it again this summer.
customer_reviews.author: P. R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easily Broken!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my sprinkler exactly one year ago. Got it out today to start using it for the yard. It is BROKEN ! The gears inside to make it oscillate are plastic NOT metal. I have another one that made it 2 years, it’s also broken. Same problem. $55 for a sprinkler that lasts 1 or 2 years is a bunch of CRAP. Looking for new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cheap sprinkler I have three of these they are easy to adjust the coverage and also the flow rate I'm going to get another one for my sprinkler system
customer_reviews.author: Roy S

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, malfunction often, break easily.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, malfunction often, break easily. These look classy but are not even a little bit durable. Dramm USED to make great products but quality has shot way down along with their warranty. Totally disappointed. This is our 6th one that hasn't lasted more than 3 months. Expensive purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Head

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed but cheap plastic adjustment dial DOA
customer_reviews.text: My unit arrived already broken, and I did not realize it until first use when I realized that the adjustment dial simply kept turning without actually adjusting the stream at all. I found that the underlying plastic part responsible for defining the dial's turn radius was broken off. Returning the unit as a result. I understand this company has a lifetime warranty, but I decided the cheaply constructed dial was not worth my time should I receive another defective unit.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin A

customer_reviews.title: great sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: Use often. A bit pricey but you do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Big Family Gal

customer_reviews.title: best sprinkler yet
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several other brands and types of . This is far and away the best I have found. pros: Large and consistent arc, works well on standard water pressure, Soaks the ground relatively fast, is attractive, and can be moved easily without turning off the water. I started 2000 sq. ft. of grass off season and got excellent results.It reminds me of old school sprinklers we ran through as a kid. Cons: expensive. The level adjustment goes wonky easily if you touch the metal arm. All in all a sturdy effective sprinkler with mostly excellent materials and craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: I love these sprinkles and have several in different colors. They WORK. Similar sprinklers stop oscillating after a short period of time and quickly become useless. These are heavy duty work horses and they are easily adjustable so I can just water where I want. Great to be in control for a change rather than at the mercy of a poor piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne C.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy!! UH OH....
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful and heavy! It puts out lots of water with a nice wide fan or the ability to narrow the fan. It covers the whole back yard with one watering! Plus the color makes it fun since I also have the matching hose! 10-12-15 Update....for some reason the oscillating on this has become off so that it waters too far down on one side and not far enough to the other side. Too much time has passed to return it so I shall have to contact ColorStorm... Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Beach girl

customer_reviews.title: it's a very nice sprinkler - very heafty
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I didn't see a posting saying that the brass parts where the water comes out can be toxic to your health. Since I bought this for our dog to play in (and inevitably drink from), I returned it. However, if it's just for watering lawns, it's a very nice sprinkler - very heafty, well made. Not actually sure if it is made in the USA, because there was a "Made in China" sticker on it. That was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: SamShan

customer_reviews.title: BEST SPRINKLER YOU CAN BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dramm sprinkler. They are absolutely the best. Sturdy, high quality product. I will never buy any other kind again.
customer_reviews.author: Lavella Medford

customer_reviews.title: great sprinkler, great price
customer_reviews.text: Have gotten tired of buying one of these sprinklers every other year so I went looking for a better, well built and designed sprinkler and I think I found it.The quality is there. operation is smooth and you have great adjustments to the spray pattern as well. Well worth the higher price . This should last me a very long time with minimal care.
customer_reviews.author: Bob L.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, functions well.
customer_reviews.text: The best sprinkler of this type I have ever owned. Durable metal frame, easy to adjust sweep. Motion device is plastic but appears to be solid and functions well.You can fine tune the amount of water at the sprinkler, handy if your at the end of a long hose. The one I received has an improved easy to grip hose attachment that is different than the pictures. Be sure to follow the instructions for assembly or you may have problems.
customer_reviews.author: TigNewton

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working while still new.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a few years ago and it lasted through several seasons before the gears gave out. I reviewed this one too soon. Now I agree with many of the other reviewers. This one worked for a few weeks, probably 10 uses. Then it started getting stuck in one place. So now I have a $40.00 paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprinkler, but it does wear out after 6-years:
customer_reviews.text: AAA+++ service and product, fast fair and highly recommend product and Amazon serivce. Re-ordered, liked so well!
customer_reviews.author: Naval Spook

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Would buy again. Spray area easy to control. Controls very easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Rickey P.

customer_reviews.title: Great sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: Need a solid sturdy sprinkler that covered a lot of ground and this is great, big coverage area and very solid
customer_reviews.author: J. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you do get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is a sprinkler that does its job well. I needed one but didn't want the plastic ones that are sold everywhere local so in order to water the earth, I had to order one online and have it shipped. Regardless of that, this has a smooth oscillating arm with easy to adjust settings. I got it in orange for the times when I can't get the teenager to cut the lawn (so I can find it). It's a very happy orange color, not neon but happy :) High recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I like this sprinkler so much that I might buy another!
customer_reviews.text: I like this oscillating sprinkler so much that I am thinking of buying another one, for the front yard! It is so easy to adjust how far the arms travels backward and forward. I like to tweak it so that it is getting the plantings, but not the patio or buildings. It feels quite heavy. If it is on the ground, it doesn't move around. If I elevate it on a patio table, the weight of the hose sometimes makes it move around, so I just stick a somewhat large stone between the 2 black bars on the bottom, and then it doesn't slide around at all, and doesn't interfere with the oscillating part.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ball

customer_reviews.title: When I received this I was very happy to see how sturdy it appeared and had high ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received this I was very happy to see how sturdy it appeared and had high hopes it would last longer than all the other sprinklers I have tried in the past. But alas, that is not to be. After only using it for two weeks I am already having issues with the sprinkler. Intermittently it is getting stuck and the back and forth oscillation stops. If I don't go and check on it every few minutes I end up wasting a lot of water.
customer_reviews.author: BDill

customer_reviews.title: High quality sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: Sprinkler appears to be of good quality. I like its metal frame and nozzles. It's much better than the plastic models I have been buying at home goods stores. I like the adjustability of the sweep. It's easy to fit into fixed areas in my yard without wasting water on unneeded areas.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Shepler

customer_reviews.title: quality sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: great sprinkler, durable and long lasting. I'm replacing another one I have that's about 6 years old that finally broke (because we drag it around by the hose). Use daily about 5 months a year.
customer_reviews.author: L.B.R.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Hopefully it will last a few seasons. One thing about that: I will take it in during the winters, because I can't be sure it can be completely drained.
customer_reviews.author: Arrow Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Good Coverage, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very particular (anal) he LOVES this sprinkler. The quality, price, and performance is top notch! He especially likes the wider sweep than the previous one we had. He has been wanting a metal construction type because of it's durability and all they have in local stores is plastic which don't last. We would purchase another one when the older one breaks. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: MJ in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Best sprinkler - finally!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it with the cheap sprinklers that either break quickly or just don't quite cover as much space as they should. I can't believe how much ground this covers. You can adjust the water flow at the sprinkler so you don't have to run back and forth to the faucet to get it just right. You can adjust how wide the spray goes. This is a really good lawn sprinkler that does a great job covering a lot of territory. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AnnLD

customer_reviews.title: JUST DID NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: THE OSCILLATING SPRINKLER JUST DID NOT WORK CORRECTLY. IT WOULD ONLY OSCILLATE HALF WAY. WE WERE WILLING TO PAY THE EXTRA MONEY TO GET AWAY FROM THE PLASTIC UNITS THAT DID NOT HOLD UP. FOR US NO LUCK FROM THE START

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: kinda pricey but worth it cause you only get one season use out of cheap ones
customer_reviews.author: MR G

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: This puts out alot of water. Well-made and still going strong. Expensive, but I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sydneydanny

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I love the flexible settings. This sprinkler has greatly reduced my watering time b/c it covers large narrow areas easily. I see that some other reviewers have brought up durability issues. I've used this for only a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: LO

customer_reviews.title: Plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to work so bad but...the main part of this sprinkler is all plastic and it's fastened with just two screws. The water hose puts downward pressure, which causes the sprinkler to jam. Perhaps if it was secured with 4 screws it might work if it was made of metal.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: We have found that these sprinklers do not last very long before fading in color and having performance issues - parts do not seem high quality so do not expect these to last if you water regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Edward T. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: Love this sprinkler! It is a built to last sprinkler.
customer_reviews.author: VERY particular buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the first one I bought because it leaked where the sprinkler meets the valve, but Amazon made the return very easy and convenient. I suspect the first sprinkler may have gotten roughed up in shipment. The second sprinkler is working perfectly! It has great range and is very well built. I suspect I will have this sprinkler for many, many years to come. I highly recommend this sprinkler.
customer_reviews.author: B2L

customer_reviews.title: The world's best oscillating sprinkler, no doubt
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, the Mercedes of oscillating sprinklers. I researched extensively and this unit, though not as fancy as others that cost considerably more, is just absolutely bulletproof. Worked flawlessly all season. Just keep the filter clean, make sure you shake out any dirt or sand and this tank will just run. The weight also makes it stable and easy to position. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ginseng

customer_reviews.title: Well built and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th Dramm sprinkler I bought.Tried other brands and none match the durability and usefulness.I wouldn’t buy any other brand.I needed 5 to cover a large lawn during an early summer drought.
customer_reviews.author: HVAC MANIAC

customer_reviews.title: Didn't live up to the hype.
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. It broke within 3 uses. I was happy to pay more for a product that I thought might last a few years, I didn’t even get a summer out of it. It almost immediately got stuck in one direction and wouldn't oscillate. I put in a new lawn and really needed a quality sprinkler with good coverage. This wasn’t it. Save your money and buy a 3 cheap sprinklers.
customer_reviews.author: Sport Mama

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: High quality oscillating sprinkler. I have owned this product in the past and continue to come back to it when I need another. Manufacturer is only a telephone call away. Their customer service department is first class and are very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. I've bought several others over the years. They've all screwed up quickly. This one I don't expect to. The most expensive one I bought previously to this was very difficult to adjust the spray left to right, almost impossible and instructions didn't help. This one is simple and well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Low quality so you have to be gentle with them ...
customer_reviews.text: Low quality so you have to be gentle with them, what happened to the built to last 50 years products of old...
customer_reviews.author: jeff snider

customer_reviews.title: not reliable
customer_reviews.text: When dramm oscillating sprinklers work, they are great. 2 of my previous sprinklers stopped oscillating so while I wait for replacements, I bought this one..it quit working after 2 tries!!! Drama has a real quality control problem!!!
customer_reviews.author: betsey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sprinkler because it is made up of mostly metal. There is minimal plastic on the outside and possibly plastic gears. You can tell when you hold it in your hands that its very well made and built to last unlike most plastic sprinklers on the market. It is very easy to adjust and best of all comes with a lifetime guarantee. Its worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Pwalli

customer_reviews.title: Best sprinkler I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Built to last. This sprinkler is well built and works well with the low volume/pressure that my well pump puts out. Other sprinklers fail to reverse direction where this one works every time. Knocked off one star as the needle to clear the nozzles was bent.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Musits

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprinkler!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sprinkler! It has a very large full coverage area and is easy to set for partial lawn coverage. It seems very well-built and durable. I am hopeful it will last us many more years than the cheaper plastic sprinklers!
customer_reviews.author: tgrrl

customer_reviews.title: Still trying to figure it out
customer_reviews.text: The package this arrived in was so beat up that I assume the directions (and the bill of lading) fell out. There are some sublties about setting the range on this sprinkler that I'm still trying to figure out which would be helped by directions. Also, we have no way to prove our purchase (if we wanted to return it, which we don't) or to register the product. It's a bad deal that someone in the shipping department would cause the product to get a less than sterling review.
customer_reviews.author: bigbendwoman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my garden..should have gotten this one years ago instead of wasting money on cheap ones..very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPerson

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: These Dramm sprinklers are great. My wife bought one at a local garden store - we liked it so much we wanted another, but they were "no longer available". A quick search on Amazon led us right to what we were looking for, with the added bonus of being able to select from multiple colors. If you're tired of cheap oscillating sprinklers that don't last one season, you should be happy with one of these units. The hardest part is selecting your favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: Jim R

customer_reviews.title: It's not all plastic and fragile
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, heavy sprinkler. It stays put and sprays a large enough pattern to cover an average lawn. The only downside so far is it occasionally stick and sprays the same angle for a while, so take a peek out at it from time to time. Wish it was perfect, but oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Wendy V

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good!
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews on sprinklers and finally settled on this unit. It arrived on time and in good condition. I haven't used it much yet but so far I am very happy with it. Adjustments are easy to make and it works smoothly. It also comes apart easily for cleaning or maintenance. Heavy enough so it stay put, there is a lot of metal used in it's construction.
customer_reviews.author: gecko

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: These sprinklers work well, I have ordered several. They have lasted a few years so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dlp

customer_reviews.title: Two months of (almost) daily use ...
customer_reviews.text: ...and still going strong! We have extraordinarily strong water pressure and have blown out more cheap plastic sprinklers than I want to think of ... the Dramm has held up beautifully - the oscillation is smooth and the water spray remains even. Plus - it's really pretty! The shiny brass and blue just looks so pretty in the grass - makes me wish for a matching hose! I would buy this again - twice over - because it's just a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shesquietest

customer_reviews.title: Glad I spent a little more and got a good sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it I had to move the arrow on the sprayer arm back to center and that took care of it sticking in one spot. I water 3 to 4 hours each evening and have not had any more problems. Its heavy, well made and the coverage is good. A little pricey, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Wanna be a Tropical Girl

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased and used cheap oscillating sprinklers for years (the Lowes and Home Depot variety) and they typically work well for only the first season and then the mechanism to control the oscillation gives out. This one is in a different league. It costs about twice as much as the discount models but I'm very happy with it. Excellent quality of construction - unlike the cheapies it has a beautiful heavy-duty metal frame, good and intuitive adjustment mechanism, and it works like a charm! I bought it for our lawn, but my wife immediately appropriated it for the garden, so I may be getting another one soon...
customer_reviews.author: ahilltopper

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sprinkler, gear movement is smooth and quick, very solid, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality item ... not good for long hoses.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. However, if you have a long distance between the hose hookup and the oscillator, the power of the water pushing through a 150 ft. hose is not all that great. So I have to move it around a lot. Other than that, it's very sturdy, never flips over, stays in place, and does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: mcpopp

customer_reviews.title: Best one I have used so far.
customer_reviews.text: Great sprinkler. I use these for my nursery, outside. I have three on a timer. Better than the competition. If the metal arm or the motor go bad, both can be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have to purchase a new one every three years....
customer_reviews.author: gracevelyn

customer_reviews.title: the only thing is you have to let it run for a good 15, 20 min to get the lawn soaked ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my large backyard, the only thing is you have to let it run for a good 15, 20 min to get the lawn soaked which is fine with me
customer_reviews.author: Catherine ng

customer_reviews.title: Huge coverage, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Who can get excited about a sprinkler? Well, if it's purple and most of the mechanics are metal, I can. It's heavyweight, covers a HUGE amount of lawn space and is highly adjustable. Who would think of making a purple sprinkler? I'm just glad they did.
customer_reviews.author: Dinah Massie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is like the sprinklers made in the 1950's. Solid and reliable!
customer_reviews.author: CapeCodRon

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I have had trouble from the beginning that it always sticks- does not oscillate. Bought it because it was quality and expensive and it is anything but.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: One out of two is bad!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these. One works perfectly (I rate it as 5 star) and one does not as it periodically locks in one position and does not continue to sweep (I rate it as 1 star for its looks.) Ergo, an average of 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Solid sprinkler.
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Metal construction for most of it. The movement assembly (between where the sprinkler bar and hose fitting) is plastic, but seems secure. I like that you can reset the 'zero position'. Nice and heavy, doesn't flop around.
customer_reviews.author: Rich J.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and works great
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and doesn't "flip over" due to the heavy duty garden hose flexing. My old all plastic water sprinkler was a joke compared to this.
customer_reviews.author: Van E. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: Dramm makes the absolute best sprinkler I have ever owned. Excellent quality and performance. A must own.
customer_reviews.author: R C.

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I used this sprinkler for about a year and a half in Colorado. About half way through the second summer one the mechanisms broke. I really liked that you can regulate the water flow but wanted to be able to regulate the width and could not do that. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Q

customer_reviews.title: What a rockin' sprinkler!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I own an oscillating sprinkler that works properly and reliably. And its the right size to hit my whole front yard without moving it. Gotta say, I hesitated at the price because, you know, sprinkler. But really it is well worth it. I saw it in a garden store for 30% more and got it at Amazon instead because $20 is $20. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the all-metal design that doesn't deteriorate in the sun like plastic. Its spray is adjustable, doing only a portion of the arc. Although you can dial down the amount of water to give a smaller pattern (or larger droplet size), you cannot adjust the width of the spray.
customer_reviews.author: Gardendaze

customer_reviews.title: Does not oscillate
customer_reviews.text: product worked for about 2 weeks, then stopped oscillating. Better off buying from a store where return window is longer. Window closed three days ago so now am stuck with it. Not much use without the ability to oscillate
customer_reviews.author: john blix

customer_reviews.title: Good value, gives lots of accurate pattern control
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for this summer, water runs through one Y splitter and 200' of 5/8" hose--and still has the full coverage advertised. Easy to control for the wide full width, shallow 1/4 upright through 15 degree sweep I needed. Still working through first full season.
customer_reviews.author: 1values1

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Great Value, invest in your own future and reduce your carbon footprint!
customer_reviews.text: Nice Quality, one only gets what one pays for! Good Value. Take care of this and you will have years of use. Not a cheap throw away product. Invest in your own future, stop buying throw away products! I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: spence

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: FAILED AFTER 1 SEASON, really disappointing. The rotating movement just stopped working so took it apart but can't be repaired....very light weight mechanism because all plastic parts inside...definitely not worth the money...higher price does NOT impute value! I'm going to buy something made in USA of all brass components
customer_reviews.author: zztop

customer_reviews.title: Consistantly works
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of this sprinkler. After about 5 seasons, our old one would get stuck in one position. We live on a farm and have a huge lawn so it gets a work out every summer.
customer_reviews.author: Whidbey gal

customer_reviews.title: Stopped in less than a year (but out of warenty of course).
customer_reviews.text: After less than a year, but outside of warranty it stopped working. I though at this price point we were getting away from junk - seems I was wrong. Won't this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Crawley

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 2 do not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 1st one, would only oscillate in one direction. Sent it back, bought another one-same thing! No more oscillating sprinklers for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Works very well - much better than the style with the plastic heart-shaped adjustment controller
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this style sprinkler. Works very well - much better than the style with the plastic heart-shaped adjustment controller.
customer_reviews.author: WF

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and adjustments work well
customer_reviews.text: Finally a metal sprinkler that should last more than one season. Plastic sprinklers never last more than one year. Great coverage and adjustments work well. I little expensive but hopefully we’ll worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Down Hill

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returned. After connecting and turning on the water, the sprinkler moved through one cycle and never moved again.
customer_reviews.author: RAL

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed.
customer_reviews.text: Sprinkler is solid and very well designed. Controls are very easy to adjust coverage area as to be used around various parts of the yard. Will diffidently purchase another when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Hibbs Family

product_meta.title: Dramm 15005 ColorStorm Premium Metal Oscillating Sprinkler with Brass Nozzle Jets, Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueDramm has been making professional watering tools for nurseries, greenhouse growers and avid gardeners for over 60 years. Dramm strives to produce products that save time and energy while providing quality products that will last a lifetime. Dramm Corporation manufactures and distributes a complete line of professional greenhouse tools and equipment throughout the world. It is the most respected name within the industry. The ColorStorm Oscillating Sprinkler has 18 brass nozzle jets to provide uniform watering and includes a needle-plug for easy cleaning of the nozzle jets. The adjustable dial and tab delivers various water patterns and spray distances for lawn care and kids water fun. This sprinkler covers an area up to 3, 036 sq. ft. (66ft x 46 ft) and is constructed of heavy-duty metal and brass for durability. The ColorStorm Oscillating Sprinkler�s sleek design and eye-catching color accents your lawn while providing even watering; Lifetime from manufacturer�s defects. Any of the ColorStorm Oscillating Sprinklers can be color coordinated with Dramm ColorStorm Premium Rubber Hose, also available on .

feature_bullets: Includes a needle-plug for easy cleaning. Adjustable dial and tab delivers various water patterns and spray distances for lawn care and kids water fun.
Variable settings allows watering up to 3, 036 Sq. Ft. 18 heavy-duty brass nozzle jets provide uniform watering.
Heavy Duty Rubber Coated Aluminum Hose Connector
Variable settings allows watering up to 3,036 sq. ft. (66 ft x 46 ft)
Heavy-duty brass jet holes with nozzle needle for simple clean-up
Available in six rainbow colors: red, orange, yellow, green, blue, and berry
